SELECT AA.* ,COALESCE(BB.CNT,0) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT /* 주문내역 */ A.ODR_NO ,B.ODR_SEQ ,DATE_FORMAT(B.ODR_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ODR_DT ,FN_NM('GDS_NM', B.GDS_CD) AS GDS_NM ,B.GDS_CD ,B.ODR_QTY ,B.AGREE_TERM ,B.GDS_PRICE ,A.ODR_STS_GB_CD ,A.MB_NO ,FN_NM('USER_NM', #{mbNo}) AS USER_NM ,C.IMG1 As RImg1 FROM TB_ODR100 A , TB_ODR110 B , tb_gds200 C WHERE A.ODR_NO = B.ODR_NO AND A.MB_NO = #{mbNo} AND B.GDS_CD = C.GDS_CD ) AA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT /* 상품후기 */ A.GDS_CD ,A.GDS_REVIEW_NO ,A.ODR_NO ,A.ODR_SEQ ,COUNT(A.GDS_REVIEW_NO) AS CNT FROM TB_GDS210 A WHERE A.MB_NO = #{mbNo} GROUP BY A.GDS_REVIEW_NO
) BB ON AA.ODR_NO = BB.ODR_NO AND AA.ODR_SEQ = BB.ODR_SEQ AND AA.GDS_CD = BB.GDS_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GDS210 (GDS_CD, GDS_REVIEW_NO, GDS_REVIEW_DT, ODR_NO, ODR_SEQ, ODR_DT, MB_NO, CONTENT, GRADE) VALUES ( #{gdsCd}, (SELECT LPAD((SELECT COUNT(gds_review_no)+1 FROM TB_GDS210 A),8,'0')), (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')), #{odrNo}, (SELECT ODR_SEQ FROM TB_ODR110 WHERE ODR_NO=#{odrNo}), (SELECT DATE_FORMAT((SELECT ODR_DT FROM TB_ODR110 WHERE ODR_NO=#{odrNo}),'%Y%m%d')), #{mbNo}, #{content}, #{grade} )
mapper.select: SELECT FN_NM('GDS_NM',A.GDS_CD) AS gdsNm, A.ODR_QTY AS odrQty, A.AGREE_TERM AS agreeTerm, A.GDS_PRICE AS gdsPrice, B.IMG1 AS RImg1, A.GDS_CD, A.CART_SEQ FROM TB_CART100 A INNER JOIN TB_GDS200 B ON B.GDS_CD = A.GDS_CD WHERE MB_NO = #{mbNo} ORDER BY A.GDS_CD, A.CART_SEQ, A.REG_DT ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TB_CALL100.CHG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS chgDt, TB_USED100.MODEL_NM AS modelNm, TB_USED100.USED_GDS_PRICE as usedGdsPrice, TB_CALL100.USED_GDS_NO, TB_USED100.IMG1 AS UImg1 FROM TB_CALL100 INNER JOIN TB_USED100 ON TB_CALL100.USED_GDS_NO = TB_USED100.USED_GDS_NO WHERE CALL_STS_CD=1 AND TB_CALL100.MB_NO=#{mbNo};

SELECT DEPOSIT_GB_CD, CHARGE_DEPOSIT, USE_DEPOSIT, REFUND_DEPOSIT, DEPOSIT_SEQ, DATE_FORMAT(DEPOSIT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DEPOSIT_DT, (SELECT REMN_DEPOSIT FROM TB_MB100 WHERE MB_NO=#{mbNo}) AS REMN_DEPOSIT, (SELECT USER_ID FROM TB_USER100 WHERE MB_NO=#{mbNo}) AS USER_ID FROM TB_MB110 WHERE MB_NO=#{mbNo} ORDER BY DEPOSIT_SEQ DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MB110 (MB_NO, DEPOSIT_SEQ, DEPOSIT_DT, CHARGE_DEPOSIT, DEPOSIT_GB_CD) VALUES (#{mbNo}, (SELECT LPAD((SELECT COUNT(MB_NO)+1 FROM TB_MB110 A WHERE MB_NO=#{mbNo}),6,'0')), (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')), #{chargeDeposit}, "1")

INSERT INTO TB_MB120 (MB_NO, DEPOSIT_REFUND_SEQ, DEPOSIT_REFUND_DT, REFUND_DEPOSIT,DEPOSIT_REFUND_GB_CD) VALUES (#{mbNo}, (SELECT LPAD((SELECT COUNT(DEPOSIT_REFUND_SEQ)+1 FROM TB_MB120 A WHERE A.MB_NO=#{mbNo}),6,'0')), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), #{refund}, '1')
mapper.update: INSERT INTO TB_MB100 ( MB_NO, REMN_DEPOSIT, LAST_DEPOSIT_DT, MB_STS_CD ) VALUES (#{mbNo}, #{chargeDeposit}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'),1 ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE LAST_DEPOSIT_DT = (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')), REMN_DEPOSIT = (SELECT SUM(CHARGE_DEPOSIT-REFUND_DEPOSIT-USE_DEPOSIT) FROM TB_MB110 WHERE TB_MB110.MB_NO = #{mbNo})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NM,EMAIL,ADDR,ADDR_DETAIL FROM TB_USER100 WHERE MB_NO=#{mbNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER100 SET USER_NM=#{userNm}, ADDR=#{addr}, ADDR_DETAIL=#{addrDetail} WHERE MB_NO=#{mbNo};
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_USER100 WHERE mb_no=#{mbNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER100 SET PW = #{userPw}, PW_ADJ_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), CHG_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), CHG_ID='system' WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
